remarks: Given a metric ` D ` and a uniform structure generated by that metric, Cauchy filter bases on that uniform structure are exactly the Cauchy filters for the metric.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Dec-2017.) (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement: cfilucfil3OLD $p |- ( ( X =/= (/) /\ D e. ( *Met ` X ) ) -> ( ( C e. ( Fil ` X ) /\ C e. ( CauFilU ` ( metUnifOLD ` D ) ) ) <-> C e. ( CauFil ` D ) ) ) $.
